name: Other Tanks
description: Other Tanks - an unusual tank arcade game with fun gameplay. Your task - to destroy enemy vehicles, your weapon - a huge cannon, charged with deadly ammunition!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: with 32 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 8 DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: No Steam overlay support
